Alert Name: bush
Social Security, Medicare: How underfunded now?
Trustees of the entitlement programs will release their annual report Monday, and experts are on the lookout for a 'Medicare funding warning.'
04/23/07 11:36 AM, EDT
The financing of Social Security and Medicare haven't been the talk of the town lately in D.C., but they will make the agenda again Monday afternoon, when the programs' trustees release their annual report.
